_comment: Created by ianb on 01/10/2014 11:47:46 using v2.1
title: Perceptions of the quality of care for community mental health services in 2013 and 2014
analysis_commentary: From 2013 people were asked to rate their overall care experience from 0 (very poor) to 10 (very good). Three quarters of people gave their care a score of at least 6 out of 10 in 2013 and 2014. There is almost no change between the two years.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
